des:
With Kamia skill, you can interact with your Kamia camera through voice.

To get started, select the ‘Enable Skill’ button in the Alexa App to link your Kamia account and discover your device(s). Find more information about connecting Smart Home devices at http://amzn.to/291lR7u.

When using the Kamia skill, you can just use the name of the Kamia camera that you created when you set up your device, or call out the group name, which you added your Kamia camera into, in your Alexa settings. You can give the voice commands like:

* To Watch the live steaming:
'Alexa, show me the living room camera.'
'Alexa, show me the garage.'
'Alexa, stop.'

* To Change the work mode:
'Alexa, set the living room camera to privacy mode.'
'Alexa, set the nursery camera to fun mode.'
'Alexa, what is the mode of kitchen camera.'

* To Cut a Clip in Fun Mode:
'Alexa, ask Kamia to cut a clip.'

* Kamia camera’s mode change can also be controlled through Alexa Routines. Just look for your Kamia camera under the Smart Home section in the Alexa app when creating a Routine. You can: 
- Set your Kamia camera to Security Mode by saying 'Alexa, I am leaving.' 
- Set the Kamia camera to Fun Mode by saying ‘Alexa, let’s have some fun.’

Currently the Kamia Skill is supported on K401. 

Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices: 
Echo Show, Echo Show 5, Echo Show 8, Echo Spot, Echo, Echo Plus, Fire Tablets Gen 7 and above, Fire TV, Fire TV Stick (2nd Generation)

More information is available at https://www.kamiatech.com/alexa
